verses.verse: Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to his anointed,<WH4899> to Cyrus,<WH3566> whose<WH834> right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> I have held,<WH2388> to subdue<WH7286> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> him; and I will loose<WH6605> the loins<WH4975> of kings,<WH4428> to open<WH6605> before<WH6440> him the two leaved<WH1817> gates;<WH1817> and the gates<WH8179> shall not be shut;<WH5462>

I will go<WH3212> before<WH6440> you, and make the crooked<WH1921> places straight:<WH3474> I will break<WH7665> in pieces the gates<WH1817> of brass,<WH5154> and cut<WH1438> in sunder the bars<WH1280> of iron:<WH1270>

And I will give<WH5414> you the treasures<WH214> of darkness,<WH2822> and hidden<WH4301> riches<WH4301> of secret<WH4565> places, that you may know<WH3045> that I, the LORD,<WH3068> which call<WH7121> you by your name,<WH8034> am the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

For Jacob<WH3290> my servant's<WH5650> sake,<WH4616> and Israel<WH3478> my elect,<WH972> I have even called<WH7121> you by your name:<WH8034> I have surnamed<WH3655> you, though you have not known<WH3045> me.
I am the LORD,<WH3068> and there is none<WH369> else,<WH5750> there is no<WH369> God<WH430> beside<WH2108> me: I girded<WH247> you, though you have not known<WH3045> me:

That they may know<WH3045> from the rising<WH4217> of the sun,<WH8121> and from the west,<WH4628> that there is none<WH657> beside<WH1107> me. I am the LORD,<WH3068> and there is none<WH369> else.<WH5750>
I form<WH3335> the light,<WH216> and create<WH1254> darkness:<WH2822> I make<WH6213> peace,<WH7965> and create<WH1254> evil:<WH7451> I the LORD<WH3068> do<WH6213> all these<WH428> things.

Drop<WH7491> down, you heavens,<WH8064> from above,<WH4605> and let the skies<WH7834> pour<WH5140> down righteousness:<WH6664> let the earth<WH776> open,<WH6605> and let them bring<WH6509> forth<WH6509> salvation,<WH3468> and let righteousness<WH6666> spring<WH6779> up together;<WH3162> I the LORD<WH3068> have created<WH1254> it.

Woe<WH1945> to him that strives<WH7378> with his Maker!<WH3335> Let the potsherd<WH2789> strive with the potsherds<WH2789> of the earth.<WH127> Shall the clay<WH2563> say<WH559> to him that fashions<WH3335> it, What<WH4100> make<WH6213> you? or your work,<WH6467> He has no<WH369> hands?<WH3027>
Woe<WH1945> to him that said<WH559> to his father,<WH1> What<WH4100> beget<WH3205> you? or to the woman,<WH802> What<WH4100> have you brought<WH2342> forth?<WH2342>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel,<WH3478> and his Maker,<WH3335> Ask<WH7592> me of things to come<WH857> concerning<WH5921> my sons,<WH1121> and concerning<WH5921> the work<WH6467> of my hands<WH3027> command<WH6680> you me.

I have made<WH6213> the earth,<WH776> and created<WH1254> man<WH120> on it: I, even my hands,<WH3027> have stretched<WH5186> out the heavens,<WH8064> and all<WH3605> their host<WH6635> have I commanded.<WH6680>

I have raised<WH5782> him up in righteousness,<WH6664> and I will direct<WH3474> all<WH3605> his ways:<WH1870> he shall build<WH1129> my city,<WH5892> and he shall let go<WH7971> my captives,<WH1546> not for price<WH4242> nor<WH3808> reward,<WH7810> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts.<WH6635>

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> The labor<WH3018> of Egypt,<WH4714> and merchandise<WH5505> of Ethiopia<WH3568> and of the Sabeans,<WH5436> men<WH582> of stature,<WH4060> shall come<WH5674> over<WH5674> to you, and they shall be yours: they shall come<WH3212> after<WH310> you; in chains<WH2131> they shall come<WH5674> over,<WH5674> and they shall fall<WH7812> down<WH7812> to you, they shall make supplication<WH6419> to you, saying, Surely<WH389> God<WH410> is in you; and there is none<WH369> else,<WH5750> there is no<WH657> God.<WH430>
Truly<WH403> you are a God<WH410> that hide<WH5641> yourself, O God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> the Savior.<WH3467>
They shall be ashamed,<WH954> and also<WH1571> confounded,<WH3637> all<WH3605> of them: they shall go<WH1980> to confusion<WH3639> together<WH3162> that are makers<WH2796> of idols.<WH6736>

But Israel<WH3478> shall be saved<WH3467> in the LORD<WH3068> with an everlasting<WH5769> salvation:<WH8668> you shall not be ashamed<WH954> nor<WH3808> confounded<WH3637> world<WH5769> without<WH5769> <WH5703> end.<WH5704>

For thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> that created<WH1254> the heavens;<WH8064> God<WH430> himself<WH1931> that formed<WH3335> the earth<WH776> and made<WH6213> it; he has established<WH3559> it, he created<WH1254> it not in vain,<WH8414> he formed<WH3335> it to be inhabited:<WH3427> I am the LORD;<WH3068> and there is none<WH369> else.<WH5750>

I have not spoken<WH1696> in secret,<WH5643> in a dark<WH2822> place<WH4725> of the earth:<WH776> I said<WH559> not to the seed<WH2233> of Jacob,<WH3290> Seek<WH1245> you me in vain:<WH8414> I the LORD<WH3068> speak<WH1696> righteousness,<WH6664> I declare<WH5046> things that are right.<WH4339>

Assemble<WH6908> yourselves and come;<WH935> draw near<WH5066> together,<WH3162> you that are escaped<WH6412> of the nations:<WH1471> they have no<WH3808> knowledge<WH3045> that set<WH5375> up the wood<WH6086> of their graven<WH6459> image, and pray<WH6419> to a god<WH410> that cannot<WH3808> save.<WH3467>

Tell<WH5046> you, and bring<WH5066> them near;<WH5066> yes,<WH637> let them take counsel<WH3289> together:<WH3162> who<WH4310> has declared<WH8085> this<WH2063> from ancient<WH6924> time? who has told<WH5046> it from that time?<WH227> have not I the LORD?<WH3068> and there is no<WH369> God<WH430> else<WH5750> beside<WH1107> me; a just<WH6662> God<WH410> and a Savior;<WH3467> there is none<WH369> beside<WH2108> me.
Look<WH6437> to me, and be you saved,<WH3467> all the ends<WH657> of the earth:<WH776> for I am God,<WH410> and there is none<WH369> else.<WH5750>

I have sworn<WH7650> by myself, the word<WH1697> is gone<WH3318> out of my mouth<WH6310> in righteousness,<WH6666> and shall not return,<WH7725> That to me every<WH3605> knee<WH1290> shall bow,<WH3766> every<WH3605> tongue<WH3956> shall swear.<WH7650>

Surely,<WH389> shall one say,<WH559> in the LORD<WH3068> have I righteousness<WH6666> and strength:<WH5797> even to him shall men come;<WH935> and all<WH3605> that are incensed<WH2734> against him shall be ashamed.<WH954>
In the LORD<WH3068> shall all<WH3605> the seed<WH2233> of Israel<WH3478> be justified,<WH6663> and shall glory.<WH1984>
